TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PriorityBindingExpression extends System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase

Docs.summary: Contains instance information about a single instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding">.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> is a single run-time instance of a PriorityBindingExpression. Therefore, it describes a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects that are attached to a single binding target property, which receives its value from the first <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object in the collection that returns a value successfully. For information about binding expressions, see the Binding and BindingExpression section in the [Data Binding Overview](../Topic/Data%20Binding%20Overview.md).
The binding engine determines which of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects is the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> based on priority. For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.

Docs.value: The active <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> object; or `null`, if no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> object is active. Although the return type is <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase>, the returned object is only a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> object because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> class currently supports only <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The binding engine determines which of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects is the ActiveBindingExpression based on priority. For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> objects inside this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression>.
Docs.value: A read-only collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> objects. Although the return type is a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase> objects, the returned collection only contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> objects because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> class currently supports only <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the parent binding has a failed validation rule.
Docs.value: `true` if the parent binding has a failed validation rule; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"> object from which this <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression> is created.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"> object from which this <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression> is created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpdateSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Updates the source on the active binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpdateTarget() cil managed

Docs.summary: Updates the target on the active binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateTarget%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> property.
